title: General Training Set 2 — Noisy Neighbours & Libraries
description: Informal-semi complaint letter to a neighbour and an essay about the role of public libraries.

task1.title: Letter to a neighbour about noise
task1.prompt: Your new neighbour has been making a lot of noise late at night. Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letter: explain the situation, describe how the noise affects you, and suggest a solution to the problem.
hints: Adopt a polite but firm tone to maintain a good relationship.
Include details about when the noise happens and why it is a problem.
Offer a reasonable suggestion to resolve the issue.

task2.title: Opinion essay — Public libraries
task2.prompt: Some people think public libraries are no longer necessary because of digital resources. Others believe libraries are essential for communities. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
outline: Introduction: paraphrase the debate and state your view.
Body paragraph 1: reasons people feel digital resources can replace libraries.
Body paragraph 2: arguments for keeping libraries as community hubs.
Conclusion: present your opinion with a clear justification.
